short_description: Perform Named Entity Recognition (NER) on input text according to user-defined dictionary words or regular expression (regex) patterns.
long_description: Perform Named Entity Recognition (NER) on input text according to user-defined dictionary words or regular expression (regex) patterns.

input_tables.name: inputtable
input_tables.rDescription: Specifies the table containing the input text data.
input_tables.description: Specifies the table containing the input text data.

input_tables.name: dict
input_tables.rDescription: Specifies the table containing user-defined dictionary words and their entity label.
input_tables.description: Specifies the table containing user-defined dictionary words and their entity label.

input_tables.name: rules
input_tables.rDescription: Specifies the table containing user-defined regex patterns and their entity label.
input_tables.description: Specifies the table containing user-defined regex patterns and their entity label.

argument_clauses.name: TextColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the name of the input table column that will be used for NER search.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the name of the input table column that will be used for NER search.

argument_clauses.name: InputLanguage
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify input language. Acceptable values are EN (English).
argument_clauses.description: Specify input language. Acceptable values are EN (English).

argument_clauses.name: ShowContext
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the number of words before and after the matched entity. If leading or trailing words are less than ShowContext ellipsis (...) will be added. Must be a positive value less than 10.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the number of words before and after the matched entity. If leading or trailing words are less than ShowContext ellipsis (...) will be added. Must be a positive value less than 10.

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the names of the input table columns that need to be copied from the input test table to output.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the names of the input table columns that need to be copied from the input test table to output.
